description: Try our easy to follow Asian-Style Baked Whole Snapper recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Asian-Style Baked Whole Snapper Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer fish to a large platter. Combine remaining chilli, reserved coriander leaves and spring onion in a bowl. Spoon one-third of syrup over fish and top with coriander mixture. Cut remaining lime into wedges and serve with fish and remaining syrup.
